chat.welcomeDescription: I'm your AI programming assistant that helps improve development workflows. I can write code, optimize performance, generate tests, analyze architecture and assist with development tasks.
chat.greeting: Hello, I'm Takumi, your AI programming assistant! How can I help you?
chat.analyzeProject: Help me analyze the code structure and architecture of this project
chat.optimizeCode: Optimize code performance and refactor this function
chat.generateTests: Generate unit test cases and test documentation
chat.askQuestions: Ask questions, edit files, or run commands
chat.beSpecific: Be specific for the best results
chat.createTakumiMd: Create TAKUMI.md files to customize your interactions with Takumi
chat.llmSupportDesc: Support for multiple LLM providers including OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, etc.
chat.fileOperationsDesc: Intelligently read, write and edit files, supporting multiple programming languages
chat.codebaseNavigationDesc: Explore and search project code, quickly locate and analyze code structure
chat.planModeDesc: Break down complex tasks into manageable steps and execute plans step by step

modes.agentDescription: For code generation, file changes, commands and other development tasks
modes.askDescription: Ask AI questions directly in terminal without file modifications
modes.planDescription: Break down complex tasks into executable steps, plan first and then execute

plan.approveDescription: Confirming this plan execution will switch to Agent mode
plan.confirmApprove: Are you sure you want to approve and execute this plan?
plan.confirmReject: Are you sure you want to reject this plan?
plan.confirmMessage: I have confirmed the above plan, please proceed with execution

mcp.formatComplete: Format 1: Complete mcpServers wrapper (supports multiple servers)
mcp.formatDirect: Format 2: Direct server mapping (supports multiple servers)
mcp.name: Name
mcp.apiKeyDescription: This API key will be used to configure the {{name}} service.
mcp.jsonFormatError: JSON format error or failed to add
mcp.mcpServersEmpty: mcpServers must be a non-empty object
mcp.commandOrUrlRequired: Single server config must have command or url field
mcp.serverConfigObject: Server "{{name}}" configuration must be an object
mcp.serverCommandOrUrl: Server "{{name}}" must have command or url field
mcp.noServersFound: No servers found in mcpServers object

model.title: Model Configuration
model.mainTooltip: Used for main code generation and complex reasoning tasks
model.smallTooltip: Used for simple tasks like generating commit messages

behavior.title: Behavior Configuration
behavior.languageTooltip: Language for AI responses and interface display
behavior.approvalModeTooltip: Controls confirmation behavior when AI executes tools

approvalModeLabels.suggest: Suggest Mode - All operations require confirmation
approvalModeLabels.autoEdit: Auto Edit - Auto edit files, commands require confirmation
approvalModeLabels.fullAuto: Full Auto - All operations execute automatically

plugins.title: Plugin Configuration
plugins.tooltip: Configure plugins used by the project
plugins.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete plugin "{{plugin}}"?
